career.title: Technical Sales Executives
career.description:
• Graduate of BS Chemistry or BS Chemical Engineering
  • Preferably with experience in Sales
  • With at least 3 years experience in Chromatography and Mass Spectrometry
  • With Good Oral and Written Communication skills
  • With Pleasing Personality
  • Preferred to Travel within the Region
  • Not more than 35 years old

career.title: Product Specialist / Application Chemist
career.description:
• BS Degree Chemistry
  • With at least 3 years laboratory experience
  • Knowledgeable on Chromatography & Mass Spectrometry Instruments
  • Self-motivated, with good interpersonal skills
  • Able to work in a team as well as independently
  • Prepared to travel within the region
  • Good communication skills
  • Not more than 35 years old

career.title: Service Engineer
career.description:
• Licensed Electronics & Communications Engineer
  • With experience in troubleshooting of analog, digital & analytical instruments
  • Good communication skills
  • Not more than 35 years old

career.title: Microbiologist
career.description:
• Graduate of BS Microbiology or BS Biology Major in Microbiology
  • With at least 3 years experience in laboratory work
  • Good communication skills
  • Not more than 45 years old

career.title: Accounting Clerk
career.description:
• Graduate of BS Accountancy
  • Not more than 35 years old
  • Proficient with MS Office, MS Excel, MS Word
  • Keen to details
  • Hardworking

career.title: Information Technology Assistant
career.description:
• Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's/College Degree, Computer Sciece/Information Technology or equivalent
  • Required skill(s) with working knowledge of windows, ubuntu (linux), software, hardware, basic networking administration, MS Office
  • At lease 1 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position
  • Preferably 1-4 Yrs Experience Employees specializing in IT/Computer - Hardware or equivalent
  • Full-Time posisiton(s) available
